positions.description: As a dedicated Quality Specialist, I excel in handling diverse responsibilities to uphold the excellence of our branded products. My key tasks include processing work orders, sampling materials, coordinating 3rd-party testing, and conducting sensory analyses. I manage the quality process with external vendors and co-manufacturers, taking charge of approving labels, creating comprehensive regulatory/quality documentation, and developing specifications and Certificates of Analysis (COA’s).Additionally, I play a crucial role in the release/hold of materials, investigating out-of-spec issues, and supporting the Product Manager in documenting both new and existing materials. My expertise extends to orchestrating mock recalls of branded ingredients, maintaining risk assessments, and ensuring compliance with upcycle certification standards. Above all else making sure we adhere to GMP standards.A significant aspect of my role involves conducting audits and ensuring compliance with various standards. I have experience in conducting BRC (British Retail Consortium) audits, ensuring adherence to global food safety standards. Furthermore, my expertise includes conducting MSC (Marine Stewardship Council) audits, focusing on sustainable fishing practices and seafood traceability. These audit experiences enhance my ability to maintain the highest quality and safety standards of our products.Through these multifaceted responsibilities, I contribute significantly to the overall quality and success of our products.
positions.description_html:
As a dedicated Quality Specialist, I excel in handling diverse responsibilities to uphold the excellence of our branded products. My key tasks include processing work orders, sampling materials, coordinating 3rd-party testing, and conducting sensory analyses. I manage the quality process with external vendors and co-manufacturers, taking charge of approving labels, creating comprehensive regulatory/quality documentation, and developing specifications and Certificates of Analysis (COA’s).

Additionally, I play a crucial role in the release/hold of materials, investigating out-of-spec issues, and supporting the Product Manager in documenting both new and existing materials. My expertise extends to orchestrating mock recalls of branded ingredients, maintaining risk assessments, and ensuring compliance with upcycle certification standards. Above all else making sure we adhere to GMP standards.

A significant aspect of my role involves conducting audits and ensuring compliance with various standards. I have experience in conducting BRC (British Retail Consortium) audits, ensuring adherence to global food safety standards. Furthermore, my expertise includes conducting MSC (Marine Stewardship Council) audits, focusing on sustainable fishing practices and seafood traceability. These audit experiences enhance my ability to maintain the highest quality and safety standards of our products.

Through these multifaceted responsibilities, I contribute significantly to the overall quality and success of our products.
